# Arbor 
  Interactive Hierarchical Tree Data Visualization Tool

## Features
* Arbor annotates the hierarchical tree stems with other plots types to provide related genetic, genomic, or clinical information.    
* An interactive hierarchical tree data visualization tool. 

## Downloads
* [Github](https://github.com/jliuob/Arbor){target="_blank"}  
* [R Shiny App](https://jennifer-liu-tree.shinyapps.io/tree/){target="_blank"}   
* [Example 1 script](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jliuob/Arbor/main/example-1.zip "download")    
    A simple example for demonstration purposes.     
    The data was designed from Case Study 1. 
* [Example 2 script](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jliuob/Arbor/main/example-2.zip "download")  
    The data was designed from Case Study 2.
  
## Requirements

* [R](https://www.r-project.org/)-Statistical computing
* [R Shiny](https://shiny.rstudio.com/)-R package
